Module com.example.project
Package javafxUI

Class Savings

java.lang.Object
javafxUI.Account
javafxUI.Savings
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoneyMarket
public class Savings extends Account
Savings class is the extension of Account class. It contains the data and specific operations needed to run a Savings account.
Author:
Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if the passed in object is an instance of Savings or not, overrides method in Account class.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Account
      Parameters:
      obj - - object
      Returns:
      true if profile of passed in object is equal to the profile of this Account otherwise false.

    • reOpen

      public void reOpen(Account newAccount)
      This function sets the passed in account object's new balance and sets the boolean closed variable to false by polymorphism and sets the new loyalty, overrides method in Account class.
      Overrides:
      reOpen in class Account
      Parameters:
      newAccount - - account object that has to be reopened

    • getBaseAnnualInterestRate

      protected double getBaseAnnualInterestRate()
      This function is used to get the annual interest rate without loyalty bonus of a Savings account.
      Returns:
      - double representing the annual interest without loyalty bonus

    • getLoyaltyBonusRate

      protected double getLoyaltyBonusRate()
      This function is used to get the annual interest rate after loyalty rate is added.
      Returns:
      - double representing the annual interest after loyalty bonus

    • getAnnualInterestRate

      protected double getAnnualInterestRate()
      This function is used to get the annual interest rate of a Savings account depending on whether the holder has been loyal or not.
      Returns:
      - double representing the annual interest depending on loyalty status

    • monthlyInterest

      public double monthlyInterest()
      This function returns a monthly interest, which in this case would be balance*annualInterest/1200, overrides method in Account class.
      Specified by:
      monthlyInterest in class Account
      Returns:
      The monthly interest that an account holder gets on his account.

    • fee

      public double fee()
      This function returns a monthly fee that an account holder needs to pay on a monthly basis, overrides method in Account class.
      Specified by:
      fee in class Account
      Returns:
      - a double that represents a monthly fee that an account holder needs to pay on a monthly basis depending on the balance.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      This function gives the name of the account type, overrides method in Account class.
      Specified by:
      getType in class Account
      Returns:
      a String, which is the name of the account type.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This function gives the account info, profile info, closing status, and loyalty status overrides method in Account class.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Account
      Returns:
      a String that describes the account type and weather the account holder is loyal or not.

    • setLoyalty

      public void setLoyalty(boolean loyalty)
      This method sets the loyalty of the account holder.
      Parameters:
      loyalty - - false for not loyal, true for loyal

    • isLoyal

      public boolean isLoyal()
      This method gives the loyalty status of an account holder
      Returns:
